entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rigolet
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023
